data.representation.images.sift.util

Class ClusteredSIFTVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.DataInstance
      • data.representation.images.sift.LFeatVector
        • data.representation.images.sift.util.ClusteredSIFTVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated.

    public class ClusteredSIFTVector
extends LFeatVector
    Same as SIFTVector, with an additional integer attribute that stores the index of the cluster it belongs to.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
